nodes.description: Kafeel Ahmed和伊拉克医生Bilal Talal Samad Abdullah在格拉斯哥机场驾驶装满丙烷气罐的Jeep撞击航站楼并引发火灾
nodes.support_text: Kafeel Ahmed was an engineer with a PhD Glasgow attack Kafeel Ahmed was one of two men held at the airport after a Jeep struck the terminal and burst into flames.

nodes.description: Kafeel Ahmed在被捕时全身90%烧伤，Bilal Talal Samad Abdullah被指控策划爆炸
nodes.support_text: The 27-year-old, from Bangalore, India, had suffered burns to 90% of his body when he was arrested. The second man in the vehicle - Iraqi doctor Bilal Talal Samad Abdullah - has since been charged with conspiracy to cause explosions.

nodes.description: Kafeel Ahmed在格拉斯哥皇家医院死亡，机场事件发生在6月30日
nodes.support_text: The man died in Glasgow Royal Infirmary on Thursday evening. He had been transferred to the specialist burns unit there from the Royal Alexandra Hospital, in Paisley.

nodes.description: Ahmed的兄弟Dr Sabeel Ahmed被指控未披露可能帮助警方逮捕恐怖分子的信息
nodes.support_text: Ahmed's brother Dr Sabeel Ahmed, who was arrested near Liverpool's Lime Street station on 30 June, has also been charged under the Terrorism Act.

nodes.description: 另一名医生也被指控与格拉斯哥袭击和伦敦两次失败的汽车炸弹有关
nodes.support_text: Another doctor has also been charged in connection with the Glasgow attack and the two earlier failed car bombings in London.

nodes.description: 他正在被武装警卫看守。
nodes.support_text: 他正在被武装警卫看守。

nodes.description: Images of Ahmed being detained at Glasgow Airport have been shown around the world
nodes.support_text: Images of Ahmed being detained at Glasgow Airport have been shown around the world

nodes.description: 乘客使用相机和手机记录事件
nodes.support_text: 乘客使用相机和手机记录事件

nodes.description: 一名非执勤警察试图拯救恐怖分子
nodes.support_text: 一名非执勤警察试图拯救恐怖分子

Kafeel Ahmed was one of two men held at the airport after a Jeep struck the terminal and burst into flames.
The 27-year-old, from Bangalore, India, had suffered burns to 90% of his body when he was arrested.
The man died in Glasgow Royal Infirmary on Thursday evening.
他正在被武装警卫看守。
